channel.title: A problem [w] trees
channel.description: k i wanna know how i can set the strengh of a woodcutting axe so you gt logs faster becuase the dragon axe should get faster logs then a bronze axe expesely at lv 99 how would i do so?

item.title: A problem [w] trees
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

errr i have a dif method… but i found out how…

my method is treeHP and
int lvlB = (playerLevel[8] / 2);

i set my tree hp 2 TreeHP = 20000; and my int LVlB to 2

so it chops 2x faster then normal and all trees have 20k logs in them

item.description:
@mages_pk_god wrote:

well… in ur method where u have the original timer for logs u could make an exception for dragon axe id to increase timer eg;

if.itemID == XXXX { return millisecond.timer 3000;

or w/e the timer thing is on your source
